::Hot Rod::
He got the comm message and reported to the bridge."Whats up, T=
alos? New orders?"

{Talos}
Bridge

    Talos waited patiently til Blackkni=
ght/fang arrived on the bridge before he began, "Thanks to a new sensor enh=
ancer setup by Condor and Sunhawk we've picked up the faint echo of a maxim=
al distress beacon somewhere north of our location. By the state of the sig=
nal the pod most likely has been here for an extensive period of time, at l=
east since the last beast wars involving Optimus Primal and his crew, likel=
y it's one of his people forgotten during the conflicts."

    Swivelling t=
he chair he touched a control on the arm rest, one of the functioning monit=
ors brought up a small outline of the ship and the area in the general area=
 including the expanded detection to the north. "I want you two to head gen=
erally north and see if you can't pick up the beacon more strongly out ther=
e since by the readings we're only getting an echo of the signal, this mean=
s it's definately outside our scanning and communication range by a decent =
amount. Find the pod and bring its occupant back. If you can manage the pod=
 as well good, if not salvage what you can from it then destroy it. Unlike =
the original beast wars I don't want Megatron getting his hands on anything=
 of our peoples."

    Nodding he shut off the display and turned back to r=
egard the pair. "I'm hoping the protoform has survived even after all this =
time, but there's no guarantee that it will be functioning nor in any state=
 to respond to you, I suggest arming yourselves just in case. In whatever h=
appens good luck and I'll see you both when you get back."
